name: RunMan: Race Around the World
description:
Are you the fastest in the world? Run! Jump! Zoom! Wallkick! Run as fast as you can! Do your best!
This is a platform game by Tom Sennett and Matt Thorson, and it wants you to have fun."elicits a kind of primal joy in me that I was worried had left long ago." TIGSource"RunMan is what Sonic should have been -- a gamer's game."
Play This Thing!"designed for the casual player... dispenses the kind of fun video games were meant to."
Jay is Games"If you don't download, enjoy, and donate money toward RunMan: Race Around the World, you are a f*cking idiot." Destructoid"Indie Game of the Year?"
IndieGames.com"Finally a game for hipsters."
snarky YouTube commenter
